html:
Dead Zebra’s New Glow in the Dark Android Mini Takes Me Back

October 10, 2024

We may earn a commission when you click links to retailers and purchase goods. More info.

It’s been a long while since we’ve showcased an Android mini from Dead Zebra, but this one is too good not to share. On sale now, there’s a glow in the dark Android mini available, priced at $14.

These little figures measure in at 3.25″ tall, with posable arms, head, and antennae. For nostalgia purposes alone, this is totally worth $14.

Follow the link below to snag your very own.

Dead Zebra Link ($14)
